title: [Riot] Store Not Working
body:
No matter how many times I try restarting my client and refreshing the store page it just does not work!
Every time I try to connect to the store it opens the stores front page with all the sales but then it quickly crashes to
"Shop Session expired"
Annoyingly this bug prevented me from buying the blood icon that came out a few weeks ago when it was still available for IP.
I tried to get into the store time after time glaring at that icon as it flashes in front of me tauntingly.
Now the icon can be purchased through RP only and the store still doesn't work.

Can someone help me resolve this so that i don't miss more opportunities and can buy the new champion when he comes out?

TLDR Store Busted, Sends me to Session Expired, - Send Help.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body: I reset the internet explorer and it works now, thanks . any way i can buy the blood mark icon for 1500 ip (the price it was first sold for)?
Unfortunately not, once any limited store promotion has ended there's no way for you to obtain it at that price unless such a promotion occurs again.

Hey there,

Have you tried running through [this knowledgebase article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753054-Store-Error-Session-Expired-There-was-a-problem-with-your-request-) on the session expired error?

Let me know if this helps out.

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=7XEtAT3A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-24T23:49:15.339+0000)
>
> Hey there,
> 
> Have you tried running through [this knowledgebase article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753054-Store-Error-Session-Expired-There-was-a-problem-with-your-request-) on the session expired error?
> 
> Let me know if this helps out.

Configured fire wall settings. the store is still not working
There was a lot more on there than just altering settings in software that could be filtering the store, did you run through all the fixes outlined on that page?
